docs.title: Changelog

docs.text: Credits ¤ Listed below all the python dependencies of blog Run Dependencies ¤ Package Description Version License Dev Dependencies ¤ Package Description Version License axblack The uncompromising code formatter - with single quotes as default. 20201010 MIT docutools Documentation Tools for the Devapp Framework 2021.7.31 BSD 2-Clause Simplified isort A Python utility / library to sort Python imports. 4.3.21 MIT jinja2-cli A CLI interface to Jinja2 0.7.0 BSD structlog Structured Logging for Python 20.2.0 MIT or Apache , 2.0 Indirect Dependencies ¤ Package Description Version License absl-py Abseil Python Common Libraries, see https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py . devapps 0.10.0 Apache 2.0 anybadge Simple, flexible badge generator for project badges. docutools 1.7.0 n.a. appdirs A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific dirs, e.g. a "user data dir". axblack 1.4.4 MIT asttokens Annotate AST trees with source code positions snoop 2.0.5 Apache 2.0 atomicwrites Atomic file writes. pytest 1.4.0 MIT attrs Classes Without Boilerplate axblack pytest 21.2.0 MIT bpytop Resource monitor that shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes. devapps 1.0.67 Apache-2.0 certifi Python package for providing Mozilla's CA Bundle. httpx requests 2021.5.30 MPL-2.0 cffi Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code. gevent 1.14.6 MIT charset-normalizer The Real First Universal Charset Detector. Open, modern and actively maintained alternative to Chardet. requests 2.0.4 MIT cheap-repr Better version of repr/reprlib for short, cheap string representations. 0.4.5 MIT click Composable command line interface toolkit axblack mkdocs 8.0.1 BSD-3-Clause colorama Cross-platform colored terminal text. click pytest 0.4.4 BSD coverage Code coverage measurement for Python pytest-cov 5.5 Apache 2.0 decorator Decorators for Humans devapps 4.4.2 new BSD devapps Apps - End to End. docutools 2021.5.10 BSD execnet execnet: rapid multi-Python deployment pytest-xdist 1.9.0 MIT executing Get the currently executing AST node of a frame, and other information snoop 0.7.0 MIT gevent Coroutine-based network library devapps 20.12.1 MIT ghp-import Copy your docs directly to the gh-pages branch. mkdocs 2.0.1 Apache Software git-changelog Automatic Changelog generator using Jinja2 templates. docutools 0.4.2 ISC greenlet Lightweight in-process concurrent programming gevent 1.1.0 MIT h11 A pure-Python, bring-your-own-I/O implementation of HTTP/1.1 httpcore 0.12.0 MIT httpcore A minimal low-level HTTP client. httpx 0.12.3 BSD httplib2 A comprehensive HTTP client library. plantuml 0.19.1 MIT httpx The next generation HTTP client. devapps docutools 0.17.1 BSD humanize Python humanize utilities devapps 3.10.0 MIT idna Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) requests rfc3986 3.2 BSD-3-Clause importlib-metadata Read metadata from Python packages mkdocs pytest-randomly 4.6.2 n.a. inflection A port of Ruby on Rails inflector to Python devapps 0.5.1 MIT iniconfig iniconfig: brain-dead simple config-ini parsing pytest 1.1.1 MIT Jinja2 A very fast and expressive template engine. jinja2-cli mkdocs-macros-plugin 2.11.3 BSD-3-Clause jsondiff Diff JSON and JSON-like structures in Python devapps 1.3.0 n.a. lz4 LZ4 Bindings for Python devapps 3.1.3 n.a. Markdown Python implementation of Markdown. markdown-include mkdocs-material 3.3.4 BSD markdown-include This is an extension to Python-Markdown which provides an "include" function, similar to that found in LaTeX (and also the C pre-processor and Fortran). I originally wrote it for my FORD Fortran auto-documentation generator. docutools 0.6.0 n.a. MarkupSafe Safely add untrusted strings to HTML/XML markup. 2.0.1 BSD-3-Clause mergedeep A deep merge function for 🐍. mkdocs 1.3.4 n.a. mkdocs Project documentation with Markdown. docutools mkdocs-exclude mkdocs-macros-plugin mkdocs-material 1.2.2 BSD mkdocs-exclude A mkdocs plugin that lets you exclude files or trees. docutools 1.0.2 Apache mkdocs-macros-plugin Unleash the power of MkDocs with macros and variables docutools 0.5.12 MIT mkdocs-material A Material Design theme for MkDocs docutools mkdocs-material-extensions mkdocs-pymdownx-material-extras 6.2.8 MIT mkdocs-material-extensions Extension pack for Python Markdown. mkdocs-material 1.0.1 MIT mkdocs-pymdownx-material-extras Plugin to extend MkDocs Material theme. docutools 1.4 MIT msgpack MessagePack (de)serializer. devapps 1.0.2 Apache 2.0 mypy Optional static typing for Python docutools 0.782 MIT mypy-extensions Experimental type system extensions for programs checked with the mypy typechecker. axblack mypy 0.4.3 MIT packaging Core utilities for Python packages mkdocs pytest pytest-sugar 21.0 BSD-2-Clause or Apache-2.0 pathspec Utility library for gitignore style pattern matching of file paths. axblack 0.9.0 MPL 2.0 plantuml UNKNOWN plantuml-markdown 0.3.0 BSD plantuml-markdown A PlantUML plugin for Markdown docutools 3.4.2 n.a. pluggy plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python pytest 0.13.1 MIT psutil Cross-platform lib for process and system monitoring in Python. bpytop devapps 5.8.0 BSD py library with cross-python path, ini-parsing, io, code, log facilities pytest pytest-forked 1.10.0 MIT pycond Lightweight Condition Parsing and Building of Evaluation Expressions devapps docutools 20200730 BSD pycparser C parser in Python cffi 2.20 BSD Pygments Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python. snoop 2.9.0 BSD PyJWT JSON Web Token implementation in Python 1.7.1 MIT pymdown-extensions Extension pack for Python Markdown. mkdocs-material 8.2 MIT pyparsing Python parsing module httplib2 packaging 2.4.7 MIT pytest pytest: simple powerful testing with Python docutools pytest-cov pytest-forked pytest-randomly pytest-sugar pytest-xdist 6.2.4 MIT pytest-cov Pytest plugin for measuring coverage. docutools 2.12.1 MIT pytest-forked run tests in isolated forked subprocesses pytest-xdist 1.3.0 MIT pytest-randomly Pytest plugin to randomly order tests and control random.seed. docutools 3.8.0 MIT pytest-sugar pytest-sugar is a plugin for pytest that changes the default look and feel of pytest (e.g. progressbar, show tests that fail instantly). docutools 0.9.4 BSD pytest-xdist pytest xdist plugin for distributed testing and loop-on-failing modes docutools 2.3.0 MIT python-dateutil Extensions to the standard Python datetime module ghp-import mkdocs-macros-plugin 2.8.2 Dual PyYAML YAML parser and emitter for Python mkdocs-macros-plugin pyyaml-env-tag 5.4.1 MIT pyyaml-env-tag A custom YAML tag for referencing environment variables in YAML files. mkdocs 0.1 n.a. regex Alternative regular expression module, to replace re. axblack 2021.7.6 Apache Software requests Python HTTP for Humans. devapps 2.26.0 Apache 2.0 rfc3986 Validating URI References per RFC 3986 httpx 1.5.0 Apache 2.0 Rx Reactive Extensions (Rx) for Python 3.2.0 MIT six Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities absl-py asttokens python-dateutil snoop 1.16.0 MIT sniffio Sniff out which async library your code is running under httpcore httpx 1.2.0 MIT -or- Apache 2.0 snoop Powerful debugging tools for Python devapps 0.2.5 MIT tabulate Pretty-print tabular data devapps 0.8.9 MIT termcolor ANSII Color formatting for output in terminal. mkdocs-macros-plugin pytest-sugar 1.1.0 MIT toml Python Library for Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language axblack devapps docutools isort pytest pytest-cov 0.10.2 MIT typed-ast a fork of Python 2 and 3 ast modules with type comment support axblack mypy 1.4.3 Apache 2.0 typing-extensions Backported and Experimental Type Hints for Python 3.5+ axblack mypy 3.10.0.0 PSF ujson Ultra fast JSON encoder and decoder for Python devapps 4.0.2 n.a. urllib3 HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more. requests 1.26.6 MIT watchdog Filesystem events monitoring mkdocs 2.1.3 Apache 2.0 zipp Backport of pathlib-compatible object wrapper for zip files importlib-metadata 3.5.0 n.a. zope.event Very basic event publishing system gevent 4.5.0 ZPL 2.1 zope.interface Interfaces for Python gevent 5.4.0 ZPL 2.1 These projects were used to build blog python | poetry | copier-poetry Many thanks to all authors, for all these brilliant software packages!
